job.title: Data Scientist, Senior, Tech Consulting - Location Open
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: At EY youll have the chance to build a career as unique as you are with the global scale support inclusive culture and technology to become the best version of you And were counting on your unique voice and perspective to help EY become even better too Join us and build an exceptional experience for yourself and a better working world for allbrbrstrongAdvisory Services Senior Data Scientist USbrbrstrongEY delivers unparalleled service in big data business intelligence and digital analytics built on a blend of customdeveloped methods related to customer analytics data visualization and optimization We leverage best practices and a high degree of business acumen that has been compiled over years of experience to ensure the highest level of execution and satisfaction for our clients At EY our methods are not tied to any specific platforms but rather arrived at by analyzing business needs and making sure that the solutions delivered meet all client goalsbrbrstrongThe opportunitybrbrstrongYou will help our clients navigate the complex world of modern data science and analytics Well look to you to provide our clients with a unique business perspective on how data science and analytics can transform and improve their entire organization  starting with key business issues they face This is a high growth high visibility area with plenty of opportunities to enhance your skillset and build your careerbrbrstrongYour Key ResponsibilitiesbrbrstrongYoull spend most of your time working with a wide variety of clients to deliver the latest data science and big data technologies and practices to design build and maintain scalable and robust solutions that unify enrich and analyse data from multiple sourcesbrbrstrongSkills And Attributes For issueliliLooking for opportunities for improving methods and outcomesliliApplying data driven approach KPIs in tying technology solutions to specific business outcomesliliCollaborating influencing and building consensus through constructive relationships and effective listeningliliSolving problems by incorporating data into decision makingbrbrliulstrongTo qualify for the role you must
